Params: {3: 'Their bodies are violently pulled through the "Gate", plunging into the space closest to the tower\'s core.'}
{3: 'The Punishing from their bodies steadily corrupts the blue core, while the core, modified by Lee, absorbs that same destructive power.'}
{3: 'It starts with the clash of swords, but soon, heavy breaths join the metallic symphony.'}
{3: 'Heavy breaths turn to exhaustion, then silence as their fists fly.'}
{3: 'The deeper they go into the tunnel, the weaker they become.'}
{3: 'In a blink, their power, granted by the Ascension-Network and Punishing vanish, leaving only themselves.'}
{3: 'But how could Selene, a creature of the Ascension-Network, ever master such crude physical combat?'}
{3: "Despite being evenly matched, Selene is constantly on the defensive. She can't even finish a sentence before Luna interrupts her with a strike."}
{3: "The spike-lined corridor becomes Luna's weapon as she discards her powers, fighting with her own body."}
{3: 'Finally, amid her own screams, Selene is violently pinned to the ground by Luna.'}
{3: "Selene's eyes widen, searching for answers. Her gaze flickers over Luna's face, finally settling on her eyes."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Is it... hatred... Do you... understand now... I was... right... You...'}
{3: "Selene's voice grows increasingly frantic, a mix of shock and joy tinged with disbelief."}
{3: "But Luna's response quickly dampens Selene's excitement."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Emotions are never simple or pure—nor are motives.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Discarding emotion doesn't make us better or wiser."}

{2: 'Selene', 3: "No... You should know how despicable those survivors are. You should follow the Ascension-Network's will... This is the only... right... path. Filtering... is... the... future. Embrace it..."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'You... and Agent Zero... have both lost your ways...'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "Why won't you finish the job... What's corrupted you... Why... cling to this hopeless world?!"}
{3: "Gripping the tunnel's spikes, she faces not just Selene, but the countless dead behind her—and ultimately, her past self."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Hating this world because there is something you cannot forsake?!'}
{3: "Before Selene can protest, Luna's blade slices through her."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "You'll... regret this... The future the Ascension-Network has planned... is inevitable..."}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the anomaly fades, Luna feels her power returning.'}
{3: 'Instead of letting her power surge wildly, Luna closes her eyes and carefully channels it, threading each strand with precision.'}
{3: "Luna's eyes snap open, sensing something's wrong."}
{3: "Defeating Selene has restored Luna's power—not just what she lost, but abilities she never knew she had. Yet, the corruption trait that should have emerged is nowhere to be seen."}
{3: 'As Luna tries to use her power to find it, she turns—and a deluge of data, a storm of light and shadow, engulfs her.'}
{3: "Countless futures flash before Luna's eyes, each one a fleeting image."}
{3: 'She witnesses hope turn to despair, life to death, over and over.'}
{3: 'Every path leads to ruin, every ending incomplete.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In a fleeting, eternal moment, Luna sees every possible future unfold before her.'}
{3: "Selene's voice has turned back to noise, but her hushed whispers still echo in the air."}
{2: 'Noise', 3: 'Such determination you have, hell-bent on creating your own future.'}
{3: 'A mysterious power surges through her arms.'}
{2: 'Noise', 3: 'The past was too painful—you can start fresh, from a better beginning.'}
{3: 'The path ahead seems clear—as if all suffering would vanish the moment Luna raises her hand.'}
{2: 'Noise', 3: 'Go now, <color=#ff4e4eff>rewrite</color> the <color=#ff4e4eff>past</color> that still haunts you.'}
